head.supplied: 'Adelaide' ¶ ¶ 'Your favor 22nd July to hand covering cheque 10£ donated to the Central A. E. & P. Assn funds by your President — Baron Sir F. Von Muéller — I shall bring this subscription before my ...

div.p: From Alexander Magarey to Alexander Macdonald
A38, letter book, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia Victorian Branch, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

'Your favor 22nd July to hand covering cheque 10£ donated to the Central A. E. & P. Assn funds by your President — Baron Sir F. Von Muéller — I shall bring this subscription before my Board at their next meeting — Personally I feel sorry that the valuable and kind assistance of your Society, and the President does not seem likely to meet very substantial reward in results from the Expedition.'
